content:
I must make assumptions, since there are no details here.

  1. - click help>troubleshootinginformation on old PC
  2. - scroll to 'profile folder' and click 'open folder'
  3. - exit thunderbird
  4. - copy the abook.sqlite and history.sqlite files to external media
  5. repeat the first three steps on receiving PC
  6. - past the abook.sqlite and history.sqlite to overlay the current versions
  7. - restart thunderbird

-
creator: davidsk

content: Also tried bypassing the wifi and connected by ethernet. Same issue.
creator: grahaman

content:
Try creating the account this way:

- go to TB menu > Settings > General > Account hub > uncheck 'Create accounts in the new Account Hub'

- go to TB menu > New Account > Email
creator: siffemoz

content: It appears you are using an older version of thunderbird. click help>about and post the release number.
creator: davidsk
